meanings.definition: The state of not being available.
meanings.sent1: During the weekend, the unavailabilities of the store frustrated many customers.
meanings.sent2: The unavailabilities of the internet connection caused delays in completing the project.
meanings.sent3: The unavailabilities of the vending machine made everyone resort to bringing their own snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her unavailabilities in responding to messages were like a locked door, keeping everyone out.
meanings.sent5: The unavailabilities of the bus schedule were as unpredictable as the weather.

meanings.sent1: The unavailabilities of the product made it highly sought after by collectors.
meanings.sent2: His unavailabilities for meetings often caused misunderstandings with his team.
meanings.sent3: The unavailabilities of the rare gemstone added to its mystique and allure.
meanings.sent4: The unavailabilities of the secret recipe gave it an air of exclusivity and intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The unavailabilities of the limited edition sneakers made them even more desirable.
